dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3932284O] adam4adam personal pictures infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2007 2:08 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3932284O] adam4adam personal pictures infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. adam4adam personal pictures infringement Added by system at Thursday, May 3 2007 07:02 pm X-MailFrom: ricky@rickymartinez.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu May 3 19:02:04 2007 Received: (qmail 12877 invoked by alias); 4 May 2007 00:02:04 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 12874 invoked from network); 4 May 2007 00:02:04 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 4 May 2007 00:02:04 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 3 May 2007 19:02:00 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 03 May 2007 19:02:00 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from ricky@rickymartinez.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HjlFI-0006ms-Iq for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 03 May 2007 19:02:00 -0500 Received: from smtp104.sbc.mail.re2.yahoo.com ([68.142.229.101]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ricky@rickymartinez.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HjlFF-000JNf-FJ for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 03 May 2007 19:01:57 -0500 Received: (qmail 27433 invoked from network); 4 May 2007 00:01:55 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO RayKim) (diaz2963@sbcglobal.net@75.30.162.56 with login) by smtp104.sbc.mail.re2.yahoo.com with SMTP; 4 May 2007 00:01:53 -0000 X-YMail-OSG: pNAq4dMVM1lkr7oJ.HQJQkgXBb5BxiHjEcALMcToNbMpKI57mnZH14SsxYMCEIhso70FcuIP y6Z4hJfA0_mn6iqjEMnKfgkgdOMcM80JIGk9yGfXNQzVH4_G1wrLy2tH Reply-To: From: "Ricky Martinez" To: Subject: adam4adam personal pictures infringement Date: Thu, 3 May 2007 17:01:48 -0700 Message-ID: <000001c78ddf$6cd3ed00$6401a8c0@RayKim> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0001_01C78DA4.C0751500" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: AceN32i9g/InnsdcQludB4eaz9qr0Q== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 May 2007 00:02:00.0849 (UTC) FILETIME=[70875810:01C78DDF] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello my name is Ramon Diaz I am the owner of Ricky Martinez Images and files I have found out that someone on the website you host www.adam4adam.com is using my pictures without my permission please let me know of a contact # where I can reach someone of this website to advised them of the problem as their is no contact info on the site itself once again thank you for your time and co-operation in this matter sincerely Ricky Martinez Can You Tame The Snake? Ricky Martinez CEO,President 12X9 Productions www.12x9productions.com ricky@12x9productions.com tel: mobile: 702-688-3036 702-688-3036 Add me to your address book... Want a signature like this? MIME element (text/html)
Hello my name is Ramon Diaz I am the owner of Ricky Martinez Images and files I have found out that someone on the website you host www.adam4adam.com is using my pictures without my permission please let me know of a contact # where I can reach someone of this website to advised them of the problem as their is no contact info on the site itself  once again thank you for your time and co-operation in this matter sincerely Ricky Martinez
